terms-conditions-file.title: Terms and Conditions
terms-conditions-file.welcome: Welcome to 3CO (the “App”), a platform dedicated to promoting sustainability and informed consumer choices. By accessing or using the App, you agree to the following Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree to these terms, please refrain from using the App.
terms-conditions-file.downloading: By downloading, accessing, or using the App, you confirm that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions, as well as our Privacy Policy, which complies with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
terms-conditions-file.scan-allow: Scan product labels to analyze logos, certifications, and other sustainability-related information.
terms-conditions-file.feedback-allow: Provide feedback and reviews on products, focusing on sustainability, fair trade, and related attributes.
terms-conditions-file.share-allow: Access and share insights about sustainable and ethical consumer practices.
terms-conditions-file.ai-usage: The App uses artificial intelligence (AI) to analyze scanned images and improve its ability to recognize sustainability certifications over time.
terms-conditions-file.agree-to: As a user of the App, you agree to:
terms-conditions-file.truthful: Provide accurate and truthful information when giving feedback and reviews.
terms-conditions-file.scan-responsabilit: Use the scanning feature responsibly and only for its intended purpose.
terms-conditions-file.intellectual-right: Respect the intellectual property rights of product manufacturers and certification bodies.
terms-conditions-file.upload: Avoid uploading inappropriate, offensive, or irrelevant content.
terms-conditions-file.eu-regulation: 3CO processes all personal data in compliance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Specifically:
terms-conditions-file.transparency: Personal data will be processed lawfully, fairly, and transparently.
terms-conditions-file.limitation: Data will only be used for purposes specified in these Terms and our Privacy Policy.
terms-conditions-file.minimization: Only the minimum data necessary to provide the App’s services will be collected.
terms-conditions-file.accuracy: Reasonable efforts will be made to ensure personal data is accurate and up-to-date.
terms-conditions-file.storage: Data will be retained only for as long as necessary for the purposes outlined or as required by law.
terms-conditions-file.security: Appropriate technical and organizational measures will be implemented to protect personal data against unauthorized access, disclosure, or misuse.
terms-conditions-file.rights: Users have the following rights under GDPR:
terms-conditions-file.rihts-erasure: Right to Erasure (Right to be Forgotten)
terms-conditions-file.rights-exercise: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us at
terms-conditions-file.data-desc: When you upload images or other data to the App, you grant 3CO a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free, and perpetual license to:
terms-conditions-file.data-analyze: Analyze the data using AI to detect sustainability certifications and logos.
terms-conditions-file.data-training: Use the data for further training and improvement of the AI models.
terms-conditions-file.data-aggregated: Share aggregated, anonymized insights derived from the data with third parties.
terms-conditions-file.data-close: Uploaded data that contains personal information will be anonymized where possible before being used for AI training.
terms-conditions-file.privacy-desc: We are committed to protecting your privacy in accordance with GDPR. For more details, please refer to our Privacy Policy.
terms-conditions-file.property-desc: All content, design, and features of the App, excluding user-generated content, are the property of 3CO or its licensors.
terms-conditions-file.prohibited-reverse: Reverse engineer, decompile, or tamper with the App.
terms-conditions-file.prohibited-harmful: Use the App to distribute harmful, illegal, or deceptive material.
terms-conditions-file.prohibited-exploit: Exploit the App for commercial purposes without prior approval from 3CO.
terms-conditions-file.warranties-as-is: The App is provided 'as is' and 'as available.' We do not guarantee:
terms-conditions-file.warranties-as-is-a: The accuracy of scanned or analyzed data.
The uninterrupted availability or error-free operation of the App.
terms-conditions-file.liability-extent: To the maximum extent permitted by EU law, 3CO is not liable for:
terms-conditions-file.liability-extent-l: Any loss or damage arising from the use or inability to use the App.
terms-conditions-file.liability-extent-i: Any inaccuracies in the scanned data or user-provided reviews.
terms-conditions-file.termination-desc: We reserve the right to terminate or restrict access to the App if users violate these terms.
terms-conditions-file.amendments-desc: 3CO may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of the App constitutes acceptance of the revised terms.
terms-conditions-file.law-desc: These Terms and Conditions are governed by the laws of the European Union and the laws of Spain.
start-screen.note: 3-CO is the ultimate app for scanning product labels and making sustainable choices. Start your eco-friendly journey!
